mapper.sql: select no, title, writer, content, view_cnt, to_char(reg_date, 'yy-mm-dd') as reg_date from t_event
mapper.select: SELECT EVE_NO, EVE_TITLE, EVE_CONTENT, EVE_FILENAME, TO_CHAR(EVE_START, 'YY-MM-DD') as EVE_START, TO_CHAR(EVE_FIN, 'YY-MM-DD') as EVE_FIN , TO_CHAR(REG_AT, 'YY-MM-DD') as REG_AT FROM T_EVENT where to_char( EVE_FIN, 'YY-MM-DD' ) > to_char( SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD') ORDER BY EVE_NO DESC

SELECT EVE_NO, EVE_TITLE, EVE_CONTENT, EVE_FILENAME, TO_CHAR(EVE_START, 'YY-MM-DD') as EVE_START, TO_CHAR(EVE_FIN, 'YY-MM-DD') as EVE_FIN , TO_CHAR(REG_AT, 'YY-MM-DD') as REG_AT FROM hr.T_EVENT where to_char( SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD') > to_char( EVE_FIN, 'YY-MM-DD' ) ORDER BY EVE_NO DESC
SELECT CITY_NO , CITY_NAME FROM hr.T_CITY ORDER BY CITY_NO ASC
SELECT LOC_NO ,LOC_NAME FROM hr.T_LOCATION WHERE CITY_NO = #{sido} ORDER BY LOC_NO ASC
SELECT STO_NO, LOC_NO, STO_NAME, STO_PHONE, STO_ADDR FROM hr.T_STORE WHERE LOC_NO = #{gugun} ORDER BY STO_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_EVENT( EVE_NO, EVE_TITLE, EVE_CONTENT, EVE_FILENAME, EVE_START, EVE_FIN ) VALUES(SEQ_T_EVENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content},#{imgFileName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
